data.comment: The big names in today's match at King Power Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 5, Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Leicester push forward at King Power Stadium and Nampalys Mendy gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Ham defence.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Leicester.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Michail Antonio for West Ham is whistled offside.
In the minute 12, Free kick Leicester.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham.
Goal! West Ham take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Michail Antonio.
In the minute 14, Aaron Cresswell with an assist there.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Andy Madley awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Andy Madley signals a Leicester throw-in in West Ham's half.
Leicester to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Leicester.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Leicester.
Nampalys Mendy for Leicester has been booked by Andy Madley and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 25, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of West Ham.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Leicester's Jamie Vardy is whistled for offside at King Power Stadium.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
West Ham drive upfield and Jarrod Bowen gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leicester defender.
In the minute 31, Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Jarrod Bowen (West Ham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
West Ham's Tomas Soucek misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Throw-in for West Ham at King Power Stadium.
Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, It's now 0-2 in Leicester as Pablo Fornals scores for West Ham.
Aaron Cresswell instrumental with a fine assist.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Throw-in high up the field for Leicester in Leicester.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leicester to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Leicester close to the penalty box.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Andy Madley has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Harvey Barnes of Leicester gets in a strike, but is off target.
Andy Madley awards West Ham a goal kick.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in West Ham.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Michail Antonio for West Ham drives towards goal at King Power Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham.
In the minute 52, West Ham are pushing forward but Fabian Balbuena's finish is wide of the goal.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for West Ham in the half of Leicester.
Jonny Evans (Leicester) has received a yellow card from Andy Madley.
Attention is being given to Leicesterâ€™s Daniel Amartey and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal kick for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 55, Cengiz Under (Leicester) has replaced the possibly injured Daniel Amartey at King Power Stadium.
In Leicester, Pablo Fornals of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
West Ham pushes forward through Michail Antonio, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 62, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 64, Andy Madley blows against Leicester's Cengiz Under for offside.
Brendan Rodgers (Leicester) is making a second substitution, with Kelechi Iheanacho replacing Ayoze Perez.
Free kick West Ham.
Fabian Balbuena's header is off-target for West Ham.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
West Ham's Pablo Fornals has been booked in Leicester.
Andy Madley signals a West Ham throw-in in Leicester's half.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 69, In Leicester West Ham drive forward through Arthur Masuaku. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leicester have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 71, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 72, West Ham apply pressure at King Power Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Declan Rice but the strike hits the bar!
West Ham are coming forward and Tomas Soucek gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
In the minute 73, Leicester have a goal kick.
Can Leicester capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Ham's half?
Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Andy Madley signals a Leicester throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for West Ham at King Power Stadium.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Leicester.
Vladimir Coufal (West Ham) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, West Ham drive forward but Michail Antonio is judged offside.
Goal! Jarrod Bowen extends West Ham's lead to 0-3.
Great play from Pablo Fornals to set up the goal.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Leicester.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
West Ham make their first substitution with Sebastian Haller replacing Michail Antonio.
In the minute 87, Mark Noble is replacing Jarrod Bowen for West Ham at King Power Stadium.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Goal kick for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Leicester's Jamie Vardy has run offside.
In the minute 89, Hamza Choudhury is replacing Nampalys Mendy for the home team.
Leicester's Jamie Vardy gets his shot away but it misses the target.
West Ham have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of West Ham.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Leicester have an attacking throw-in.
Leicester push upfield but Andy Madley quickly pulls them for offside.
The match has come to a close in Leicester. The final score is 0-3.
